title: Didot looks similar but this one looks more elegant, any reccomendations ?
content:
Hi, i want to know what type is this,

Didot is similar but not the same...

also could you please reccoment other type s like "magazine" type of fonts ?

thanks.

jorge

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [font.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415113521/http:/typophile.com/files/font_395.jpg) | 12.99 KB |
author: TweakingKnobs

comments.content:
Can't spot a match but as almost all fonts coming from (fashion) magazine are bespoke... What's your sample origin? Maybe we could spot the name at least...  
Alternatives: [Miller Banner](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415113521/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontbureau/miller-banner), [Austin Hairline](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415113521/http:/typophile.com/wiki/https%3A/%252Fcommercialtype.com/typefaces/austin/hairline), [Chronicle Display](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415113521/http:/www.typography.com/fonts/chronicle-display/overview)

EDIT: finally found it... [AW Conqueror](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415113521/http:/typofonderie.com/fonts/aw-conqueror-family) Didot Light.

AW Conqueror Didot Light, free from Typofonderie:  
 [http://typofonderie.com/fonts/aw-conqueror-family/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415113521/http:/typofonderie.com/fonts/aw-conqueror-family/ "http://typofonderie.com/fonts/aw-conqueror-family/")

Not sure what you mean by “magazine” typefaces (fashion?), but these links may be helpful:  
 [http://fontsinuse.com/in/2/formats/11/magazines](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415113521/http:/fontsinuse.com/in/2/formats/11/magazines "http://fontsinuse.com/in/2/formats/11/magazines")  
 [http://fontsinuse.com/in/1/industries/24/fashion-apparel](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415113521/http:/fontsinuse.com/in/1/industries/24/fashion-apparel "http://fontsinuse.com/in/1/industries/24/fashion-apparel")

Your sample is AW Conqueror Didot Light: [http://typofonderie.com/fonts/aw-conqueror-family/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415113521/http:/typofonderie.com/fonts/aw-conqueror-family/ "http://typofonderie.com/fonts/aw-conqueror-family/")

Edit: oh man, how slow I am...
